name: Tome of the Eternal Flow
desc: A manual that was once passed down from generation to generation within an underwater priory. Today, none know of its existence.
passive: HP is increased by 16%. When current HP increases or decreases, Charged Attack DMG will be increased by 14% for 4s. Max 3 stacks. This effect can be triggered once every 0.3s. When the character has 3 stacks or a third stack's duration refreshes, 8 Energy will be restored. This Energy restoration effect can be triggered once every 12s.
